newsitem.title: USA: Renaissance Solutions to file for offering.
newsitem.headline: Renaissance Solutions to file for offering.

text.p: Renaissance Solutions Inc said on Wednesday it plans to file to offer 1.1 million shares of its common stock.
Renaissance said that of those shares, about 56,400 are to be offered by the company while the rest are to be offered by certain selling stockholders.
The company plans to grant the underwriters an option to purchase up to an additional 165,000 shares of common stock to cover any over-allotments.
The net proceeds are to be used for working capital and general corporate purposes, including possible acquisitions.
